author: gstein
msg: Update the bindings for the apply_textdelta checksum change, plus a
couple tweaks to the mailer.py script.
(thunk_apply_textdelta): add the two new checksum parameters and
pass them off to the Python callback.
(PipeOutput.start): pass extra params to the mailer command line so
that the proper envelope header can be set.
(Config._prep_groups): sections might not have a for_paths option,

author: kfogel
msg: Finish commit checksumming for issue #689, by finishing the work begun
in revision 4407: Close the write stream before finalizing the node
revision, so the new rep's checksum is stored in time to be available
... close them here, but before svn_fs__dag_finalize_edits.

author: fitz
msg: Decided to ditch markup until O'Reilly gets back to me about how they
want it (a gazillion subcommands isn't something I want to markup
twice).  Dumping everything in a screen block for now.
with the rest of them laid out.
* /trunk/doc/book/book/ch05.xml: Change broken xref and mark as TODO.

author: kfogel
msg: More work on issue #689: Put the end-to-end checksum path for commits
in place, but leave it disabled at very last step, in
svn_fs__dag_finalize_edits, due to mysterious lossage.  CMike, CYa in
(struct put_baton_t): Add base_checksum and result_checksum fields.
(commit_apply_txdelta): Copy the checksums into the put_baton.
(commit_stream_close): Put checksums into headers if present.
result_checksum to apply_textdelta.  Also, fix error string.
arguments, copy them into baton.  Also, remove obsolete comment.
(svn_fs__dag_finalize_edits): Take new checksum arg, compare it
with noderev->edit_key's checksum.  But temporarily set the
comparison behind an impossible conditional, as not yet working.
(svn_test__set_file_contents): Pass nulls for checksum arguments to
(file_integrity_helper): Pass nulls for checksum arguments to
* various files: Deposit "### todo#689: " comments in some unhandled
transmission cases that don't go through the editor interface, and
in some of the locations we'll have to tweak later for updates.
